```{r}
#libraries
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#clean data
kish = read.csv("Data/Kish11-9.csv")
kish = kish[-c(1:39),1:5]
kish = kish[-c(1:2),]
colnames(kish) = c("UTCTime", "LocalTime", "TempC", "Volts", "Mag/Arcsec2") 
kish = mutate(kish, Hour = hour(kish$LocalTime))

#remove low volt cases
kish = kish %>%
  filter(Volts>4)

#####Day/Night#####

#Day cases
kishDay = kish %>%
  filter(Hour<18 & Hour>=6)

#Night cases
kishNight = kish %>%
  filter(Hour>=18 | Hour<6)
```
